column2: AI characters will be allowed to receive Ancient Religions Revival events.
AI characters will be allowed to receive Ancient Religions Revival events, but the frequency is 1/10 of normal.
Only players will be eligible for Ancient Religions Revival events.
The Unfit Gaelic King mechanic will be enabled. §RWARNING:§! This feature is in beta. Use at your own discretion.
The Unfit Gaelic King mechanic will be disabled.
